scenario: After a long week at work or school, you have the weekend free. Your ideal way to recharge is to:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Spend time alone reading, watching movies, or pursuing solo hobbies

choices.label: B
choices.text: Have a quiet dinner or coffee with one or two close friends

choices.label: C
choices.text: Organize or attend a group gathering, party, or social event

scenario: In a classroom or meeting setting, when asked to discuss ideas:

choices.label: A
choices.text: You prefer to think through your response before speaking

choices.label: B
choices.text: You sometimes speak up but usually after considering your thoughts

choices.label: C
choices.text: You naturally think out loud and enjoy verbal brainstorming

scenario: You're invited to a networking event where you don't know many people. You:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Feel drained by the idea and would prefer to skip it

choices.label: B
choices.text: Go but stick to talking with a few people you connect with

choices.label: C
choices.text: Get energized by meeting new people and making connections

scenario: When facing a personal problem or challenge, you typically:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Process it internally before talking to anyone

choices.label: B
choices.text: Think it through alone but may discuss with someone close

choices.label: C
choices.text: Talk it through with others to clarify your thoughts

scenario: Your phone rings with an unexpected call from a friend. Your first reaction is:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Slight reluctance - you'd rather text or respond later

choices.label: B
choices.text: Neutral - depends on your mood and the friend

choices.label: C
choices.text: Excitement - you enjoy spontaneous conversations

scenario: When learning something new (like a software tool or recipe), you prefer to:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Follow step-by-step instructions carefully

choices.label: B
choices.text: Get the basics then experiment to learn more

choices.label: C
choices.text: Understand the big picture first, then figure out the details

scenario: When someone explains a concept to you, you understand it better through:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Concrete examples and real-world applications

choices.label: B
choices.text: A mix of examples and underlying principles

choices.label: C
choices.text: Theories, patterns, and how it connects to other ideas

scenario: When planning a vacation, you focus more on:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Specific activities, accommodations, and logistics

choices.label: B
choices.text: Key highlights while leaving room for spontaneity

choices.label: C
choices.text: The overall experience, new perspectives, and possibilities

scenario: In conversations, you're more interested in:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Facts, details, and what actually happened

choices.label: B
choices.text: Both the story and its meaning

choices.label: C
choices.text: Implications, meanings, and what could be

scenario: When making decisions, you rely more on:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Past experiences and proven methods

choices.label: B
choices.text: A combination of experience and intuition

choices.label: C
choices.text: Your gut feeling and future possibilities

scenario: A friend asks for honest feedback on their work. You:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Give direct, objective criticism focused on improvement

choices.label: B
choices.text: Balance honesty with encouragement

choices.label: C
choices.text: Emphasize positives first, then gently suggest changes

scenario: When making an important life decision, you prioritize:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Logic, efficiency, and objective analysis

choices.label: B
choices.text: Both rational factors and personal values

choices.label: C
choices.text: How it affects people and aligns with your values

scenario: A colleague is upset about a work situation. Your instinct is to:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Help them analyze the problem and find solutions

choices.label: B
choices.text: Listen empathetically then offer practical advice

choices.label: C
choices.text: Provide emotional support and validate their feelings

scenario: In a disagreement, you're more focused on:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Who's logically correct and finding the truth

choices.label: B
choices.text: Understanding both perspectives fairly

choices.label: C
choices.text: Maintaining harmony and understanding feelings

scenario: You feel proudest when people see you as:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Competent, logical, and fair

choices.label: B
choices.text: Both capable and considerate

choices.label: C
choices.text: Caring, understanding, and supportive

scenario: Your approach to daily tasks and responsibilities is:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Make a to-do list and work through it systematically

choices.label: B
choices.text: Have a general plan but stay flexible

choices.label: C
choices.text: Handle things as they come up, based on mood and energy

scenario: When working on a project with a deadline:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Start early and work steadily according to a schedule

choices.label: B
choices.text: Plan to start early but sometimes work in bursts

choices.label: C
choices.text: Work best under pressure close to the deadline

scenario: Your living or workspace tends to be:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Organized with everything in its designated place

choices.label: B
choices.text: Mostly organized with occasional clutter

choices.label: C
choices.text: Flexible organization - organized chaos that makes sense to you

scenario: When plans change unexpectedly, you typically:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Feel frustrated and need time to adjust

choices.label: B
choices.text: Feel slightly uncomfortable but adapt reasonably well

choices.label: C
choices.text: Easily go with the flow and embrace the change

scenario: When making weekend plans with friends:

choices.label: A
choices.text: Prefer to decide and confirm plans several days ahead

choices.label: B
choices.text: Like having a general idea but keep some flexibility

choices.label: C
choices.text: Prefer to decide spontaneously based on how you feel
